Detailed Description

Class Angle. Represents an angle and offers some functions to handle angles. Angle fixes itself so that it is always inbetween 0 and 2*Pi
Author:
Lasse Hakulinen

float Angle::getDistance (  float  angle,
int  direction = 0
)  const
 

Gets the distance between the angle and a given angle.

Parameters:
angle - the other angle
direction - direction where the distance is calculated if direction > 0 = from the angle to positive direction if direction < 0 = from the angle to negative direction if direction = 0 = shortest distance
